name: Alter Fate
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, discard 1 Condition of your choice.

name: Arcane Insight
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, gain 2 Clues.

name: Astral Travel
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, move to any space on the board.

name: Bind Monster
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, choose a Monster on your space. It loses all of its abilities until the end of the Mythos Phase.

name: Blessing of Isis
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, you and another investigator on your space become Blessed.

name: Clairvoyance
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, look at the top 2 cards of the Mythos deck. Place them back in any order.

name: Dread Curse of Azathoth
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, gain +5 Strength during Combat encounters this round.

name: Flesh Ward
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, prevent up to 2 damage.

name: Mists of Releh
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, you may move to an adjacent space.

name: Poison Mist
text: Test Lore (–1). If you pass, deal 2 damage to a Monster on your space.
